verbose_text: NSIP is also triggered by the programmed cell death-1 / programmed cell death-ligand 1 (PD-1 / PD-L1) inhibition and, to a lesser extent, the anti-cytotoxic T lymphocyte antigen (anti-CTLA-4) immune checkpoint inhibitors.
